reviewText: Well I took the time to watch this just to say I watched it. The only thing I found I liked about it was made to be a long movie. It does have a beginning, middle and, ending of a story but, it isn't enough to get me to buy it. The way they made the video turned out badly.
Great story and drawings and combat viewing.
if you like top gun then get this anime very cool.  the dog fight scenes are very well done.  must see.
I had the original movie series on VHS, but love the remastered version and updated movie series.  I would buy this again.  Product was in like new condition as described by the seller.
